label: 院殿上人
対訳語: Courtier in Attendance on the Ex-Sovereign
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
見出し読み: いんのでんじょうびと
見出し読み_mod: いんのでんじょうびと
説明文: These were to the Ex-Sovereign (In) what the Courtiers in Attendance on the Sovereign (Denjōbito) were to the Sovereign (Tennō ). [院、殿上人、天皇]
